subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: First-place Manchester United played with 10 men for most of the game and beat West Ham, 4-1, behind two goals from Cristiano Ronaldo. The victory put further pressure on second-place Chelsea in the Premier League race. United has 84 points and is 3 ahead with a game left. Chelsea, United’s only rival for the title, has a game in hand and plays Newcastle on Monday.
